Claim welcome value up to 4,500 and up to 350 free spins, join missions and tournaments, and withdraw winnings smoothly after verification. 24/7 support and control tools keep your play confident and comfortable.

advantages.title: Advantages
advantages.advantagesAfterText: In our casino, we bring games and betting together so you can move between sections in seconds. We focus on clear rules, comfortable bankroll control, and reliable 24/7 service. Every session is built for maximum entertainment — from rapid rounds to full live tables.

history.title: About Powerup
history.description1: We stand out by keeping slots, live casino, and sports betting under one account — everything in one place. We focus on fast transactions, clear terms, and built‑in tools that help you stay in control.
history.description2: Our casino is built for players who love momentum and want a big hit of entertainment every time they log in. We bring slots, live casino, and sports betting together so you can pick the perfect format for your mood. In the lobby you’ll find thousands of games across different volatility levels, from steady sessions to high‑risk spins with explosive potential.
history.description3: We add fresh releases regularly so every day feels like a new drop. In the live area, you’ll play on real tables with professional dealers where strategy, pace, and focus matter. For quick thrills, we support fast formats that deliver outcomes without delay. In the betting section, you can build multis, follow markets, and jump into in‑play action as matches unfold. We support convenient deposit and withdrawal options so payments never get in the way of your fun. Before your first withdrawal, we run verification to protect your account and transactions. Our support team is available around the clock and helps with everything from login to payout status. To kick things off, we offer welcome deals that boost your early sessions and give you more chances to land a great moment. Throughout the week, you’ll see extra promos, missions, and game challenges that keep the experience fresh. We value regular players and develop bonus programmes where your progress turns into privileges and tailored offers. It’s easy to manage your play with limits, breaks, and reminders so sessions stay comfortable. We promote responsible play and keep the focus on gambling as entertainment. Our vibe is modern, energetic, and designed for fast access to your favourite sections. We deliver a service where speed, convenience, and confidence come first. That’s why many players choose us when they want everything in one place without extra steps.

customHtml.title: Powerup: your comfort — rules, security, support
customHtml.description:
Visiting & Playing Rules: comfort, safety, control

In our casino, we keep the rules clear so every visit feels smooth and secure. Access is strictly for adult players. Registration is fast, and your account data is protected so you can play with confidence. We ask you to provide accurate personal details because it helps speed up verification and withdrawals. During play, we expect respectful communication in chat and when contacting support. We promote fair play and don’t allow actions that distort outcomes or break platform rules. Third‑party tools, attempts to bypass restrictions, and multi‑accounting aren’t allowed. We prioritise payment safety, so we may request identity confirmation before your first withdrawal or if we detect unusual activity. We encourage responsible play and recommend setting a budget and session time in advance. In your account, you can use control tools that help keep play balanced and comfortable. If gambling stops feeling like entertainment, we offer break modes and self‑exclusion. Our goal is a positive experience where you stay in control.


Conditions of access and play

  • • Age & access: play is available only after confirming adulthood and accepting the rules to keep the environment safe.
  • • One account per player: use a single profile so your history, bonuses, and limits work correctly.
  • • Accurate details: enter real information at sign‑up to speed up checks and payouts.
  • • Verification (KYC): before your first withdrawal, we may request documents to protect your account and transactions.
  • • Payment rules: use payment methods in your own name for smoother processing.

Prohibited actions

  • • Multi‑accounting: multiple profiles break the rules and disrupt fair promo conditions.
  • • Third‑party tools & scripts: any automation or interference with gameplay is not allowed.
  • • Bypassing restrictions: attempts to bypass limits, self‑exclusion, or security checks are prohibited.
  • • Unfair promo activity: strategies designed to exploit promotional terms aren’t permitted.
  • • Abusive communication: harassment, threats, and toxic behaviour in chat or support requests are not allowed.

Responsible play

  • • Limits: set deposit and time limits to stay in control.
  • • Breaks & self‑exclusion: use cool‑off and self‑exclusion when you need time out.
  • • Entertainment mindset: treat play as leisure, not income.
  • • Support help: contact our team if you want extra account restrictions enabled.

Security, licensing, and data protection in our casino

We’re built so you can feel confident at every step — from sign‑up to withdrawing your winnings. Licensing is a foundation of transparency for us, and we follow requirements designed to support fair gameplay and proper financial processing. As part of compliance, we apply identity checks, especially before your first withdrawal, to protect your account from unauthorised access. We also use internal activity reviews to spot unusual behaviour and prevent abuse. All of this helps us maintain a secure environment and consistently high service standards.


Data protection in our casino follows a “need‑to‑know” approach. We handle only the information required for registration, account servicing, payouts, and essential security procedures. Access to personal data is restricted, and activity involving sensitive information is monitored. We continually refine our processes to match modern privacy and security expectations. For you, that means predictability: your data is used for clear purposes, not for unnecessary noise.


Encryption is a core part of our infrastructure. Information exchanged between your device and our systems is protected with cryptographic methods that support confidentiality and integrity. This matters for logins, balance management, and all payment actions. We reinforce encryption with technical safeguards such as monitoring, filtering, and session controls. This layered approach reduces risk and keeps your experience smooth.


Our privacy approach is built on clear principles: transparency, control, and security. We explain what data we collect, why it’s needed, and how it may be stored as part of required procedures. You can manage parts of your privacy settings inside your account and contact support with any data‑handling questions. We respect personal information and use it to improve your experience rather than push intrusive scenarios. The result is a calm, confident journey where privacy is practical, not just promised.


Financial security is supported by a mix of checks and sensible rules. We encourage payment methods in the same name as the account holder to keep transactions clean and consistent. On withdrawals, we may request confirmations and match details to reduce error risk and protect funds. We also apply anti‑fraud measures and follow standards aimed at preventing financial misuse. That helps deliver safe deposits, reliable payouts, and stable platform performance.


Finally, security isn’t only about technology — it’s also about service culture. We train our support team to handle data responsibly and follow protection standards in every interaction. We encourage strong passwords and careful account access habits. Combined with built‑in responsible play tools, this creates a space where it’s easy to manage risk. Our goal is to keep you focused on games and betting, not on trust concerns.


24/7 Customer Support — fast replies, real help

Our support team is available around the clock so you can get help whenever it suits you. We assist with registration, login, profile settings, and verification. If you have a question about bonuses, we explain terms in clear language and guide you through activation. For payments, we support you from deposit to withdrawal and keep you updated on processing status. Live chat gives you the quickest responses, especially for urgent issues. Email is perfect when your case needs details, screenshots, or a documented trail. Phone support is ideal when you want to talk it through and follow step‑by‑step guidance in real time. We keep communication friendly and practical — no unnecessary back‑and‑forth. We respect privacy: we never ask for your password and follow safe procedures only. Our priority is outcomes, so you can get back to play without delays. We can also help you enable limits, breaks, and other responsible play tools. The goal is support that genuinely saves you time.


Contact channels

  • • Live chat: the fastest way to get answers about games, promos, betting, and transactions.
  • • Email: best for detailed requests, verification documents, and cases with attachments.
  • • Phone: great for complex issues that need quick, guided resolution.

Response times and service quality

  • • Live chat: typically within minutes, with only essential follow‑up questions.
  • • Email: quick priority replies, plus thorough breakdowns for complex cases.
  • • Phone: fast connection and clear instructions to keep you moving.

Language availability

  • • Core languages: we support the most in‑demand languages so you can feel confident.
  • • Clarification help: for unusual requests, we help structure your message and gather what’s needed.
  • • Consistent quality: the same attentive standard, regardless of language.

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Powerup
customHtml_2.description:
PowerUp Loyalty Programme — tiers, perks, and rewards for activity

Our loyalty programme is designed to turn your activity into real benefits. The more you play slots, live casino, or place bets, the faster your status grows. We award points for genuine play rather than complicated hoops, so progress feels clear and predictable. From the beginning, you can receive personalised offers and access recurring rewards. As you level up, bonuses improve, cashback increases, and payout handling becomes faster. We also add tailored missions that match your play style. Members unlock special promos, free spins, and exclusive tournaments more easily. Perks apply across casino and betting so you get value in any format. We reward consistency with streak‑style bonuses for regular activity. Everything is visible in your account — tier, points, and available rewards. There are no confusing surprises: you know what the next tier unlocks. The loyalty programme makes every session more rewarding and more fun.


Registration conditions

  • • Step 1: Account — sign up and confirm your email to secure your profile and promo access.
  • • Step 2: Currency choice — select your preferred balance format for smoother transactions.
  • • Step 3: Activation — enrolment activates automatically after your first activity.
  • • Step 4: Points — points are earned through wagering on slots, live games, and sports events.
  • • Step 5: Verification — complete KYC before your first withdrawal to unlock payout perks faster.

Tiers and how to reach them

  • • Tier 1 — Starter: from 0 points, starter rewards and base missions.
  • • Tier 2 — Boost: from 1,000 points, cashback up to 5% and weekly tasks.
  • • Tier 3 — Turbo: from 5,000 points, up to 50 free spins weekly and faster handling.
  • • Tier 4 — Nitro: from 15,000 points, cashback up to 10% and personalised promo codes.
  • • Tier 5 — Elite: from 40,000 points, cashback up to 15%, priority support, personal host.

Loyalty bonuses

  • • Weekly cashback: up to 15% of net losses — credited as bonus or cash depending on tier.
  • • Reload bonus: up to 50% top‑up boost on selected days.
  • • Free spins: up to 50–150 FS based on tier and weekly promos.
  • • Personal missions: rewards up to 300 in bonus value for completing task chains.
  • • Exclusive tournaments: prize pools up to 10,000 during seasonal events.
  • • Faster withdrawals: priority processing queue from Turbo tier and above.

Bonuses & special offers — more play, more chances, more excitement

We keep your experience packed with reasons to return and play with extra value. New players can claim welcome offers that supercharge the start and give more shots at a great hit. During the week, we run additional promos around top‑ups, free spins, and cashback mechanics. If you love momentum, you’ll enjoy missions and challenges where rewards arrive through clear actions and progress. In slots, you’ll see recurring tournaments with leaderboards where activity and luck both matter. In the live casino, we run campaigns that reward streaks and participation on selected tables. For fast formats, we host “marathon”‑style events that pay out for short, energetic sessions. In betting, we add themed promos around major match days to heighten the thrill. Seasonal events shift the vibe with limited‑time tasks, unique rewards, and time‑boxed offers. We also launch “happy hours” that increase promo value on selected games. To keep it varied, we rotate offers across slots, live tables, and betting so everyone finds their favourite. Promo terms are clear: you can see requirements, timing, and potential rewards up front. Credits land quickly so you can keep playing without waiting. The pace stays fun — rewards feel like part of entertainment, not a chore. Support is always there if you want help choosing the right offer. Our promos are built to boost the excitement and open more possibilities in the games you enjoy. The result is simple: more options, more chances, more fun.


Bonuses and offers

  • • Welcome package: up to 4,500 + up to 350 FS — boosts early deposits and extends playtime.
  • • Seasonal boosted start: up to 7,000 + up to 350 FS — limited campaigns for a powerful launch.
  • • First deposit bonus: up to 100% (for example, up to 150) — quick balance boost for slots and live play.
  • • Reload deals: up to 50% (for example, up to 500) — recurring offers on repeat top‑ups.
  • • Cashback week: up to 15% (for example, up to 4,500) — return on net losses over the period.
  • • Live cashback: up to 25% (for example, up to 300) — extra value for live table action.
  • • Daily free spins: up to 25–100 FS — credited for simple activity conditions.
  • • Slot tournaments: prize pools up to 10,000 — leaderboard races based on points and streaks.
  • • Drops campaigns: prizes up to 2,000 — instant rewards on selected games.
  • • Weekend marathons: bonuses up to 300 — weekend challenges for fast sessions.
  • • Live missions: rewards up to 500 — task chains across roulette, blackjack, and show games.
  • • Betting promos: bonuses up to 100 — themed boosts for big events and multis.
  • • Seasonal events: prizes up to 5,000 — limited campaigns with unique tasks and rewards.
  • • Happy hours: promo value up to 2× — increased rewards during selected time windows.

Games & betting in our casino — slots, live tables, and sports action

With us, you can pick the perfect format for any mood: fast slots, immersive live casino, or high‑energy sports betting. Our slots section features thousands of titles, including classics and modern games packed with bonus rounds. We support a wide range of stakes so both cautious players and high‑tempo fans feel comfortable. For a real casino vibe, we offer live tables with dealers where strategy and focus matter. The live area also includes show‑style formats that add spectacle and surprise. If you love classic table play, you’ll find roulette, blackjack, baccarat, and video poker in virtual versions. For quick hits, we feature fast games built around instant outcomes. In betting, you’ll see a broad event line plus in‑play markets as matches unfold. We support singles and multis so you can shape your own risk‑and‑reward scenarios. Everything runs through one account, and switching between betting and games takes seconds. Smart filters and curated sections help you find favourites faster. The result is variety, smooth navigation, and one entertainment ecosystem.


Key categories

  • • Slots (Pokies): classics, Megaways‑style mechanics, bonus rounds, free spins, and fast‑spin options.
  • • Jackpot titles: games built around bigger hit potential and extra bonus mechanics.
  • • Live casino: roulette, blackjack, baccarat, plus interactive show games.
  • • Table games: European roulette, blackjack variants, video poker, and card formats.
  • • Fast games: crash formats, Plinko‑style mechanics, and instant‑result titles.
  • • Sports betting: pre‑match and in‑play markets, singles, multis, and combined outcomes.
  • • Esports: matches and tournaments across popular disciplines with flexible markets.

Betting limits — minimum and maximum stakes by category

We support flexible limits so you can play your way — from careful staking to higher‑level action. Ranges depend on the specific game, provider, and table, and exact values are always shown before you confirm your bet. Below are practical guide ranges for the most popular sections to help you understand the scale at a glance. This makes bankroll planning and pace selection much easier.


Game Type Min Bet Max Bet
Slots (standard spins) 0.10 100
Slots (higher ‑ limit titles) 0.50 500
Fast games (crash / Plinko) 0.20 200
Virtual roulette 0.20 1,000
Live roulette 0.50 5,000
Virtual blackjack 0.50 1,000
Live blackjack 1 10,000
Baccarat (virtual) 0.50 2,000
Sports betting (singles) 0.50 20,000
Multis (parlays) 0.50 10,000

Withdrawals and payout speed — methods, timelines, limits

We’ve made withdrawals as smooth as possible so you can receive your winnings quickly. It’s important that your payment method is set correctly and matches the account holder. Before your first withdrawal, we complete identity verification to protect your profile and transactions. Once verified, payouts are processed steadily and predictably. In most cases, internal handling takes around 24–48 hours, and the final delivery time depends on the method you choose. E‑wallets are often faster because they avoid extra banking cycles. Crypto withdrawals can be very quick after approval, which suits players who value momentum. Bank transfers may take longer due to business days and standard banking procedures. You can track payout statuses in your account so you always know what’s happening. If you need support, we’ll help check the details and speed up the investigation. We also keep limits clear so withdrawals remain controlled and secure. The result is a reliable payments experience that lets you stay focused on entertainment.


Withdrawal methods

  • • Bank transfer: great for larger amounts and steady processing, timing depends on bank cycles.
  • • E‑wallets: a fast way to receive funds after approval.
  • • Cryptocurrency: ideal for quick transfers and flexible balance management.
  • • Cards (where available): a familiar option with straightforward processing.

Payout speed and processing times

  • • Internal processing: typically 24–48 hours after identity and request details are confirmed.
  • • E‑wallets: often within 24 hours after approval, depending on the provider.
  • • Crypto: commonly within hours after approval, subject to network conditions.
  • • Bank transfer: usually 2–3 business days due to banking procedures.

Withdrawal limits

  • • Minimum withdrawal: commonly from 30–50 (exact value depends on method).
  • • Maximum per transaction: can reach several thousand or more depending on method and account status.
  • • Daily/weekly limits: set by payment method and account level to keep processing secure.

items.title: Can I play in demo mode?
items.answer: Yes, many games include a try‑out mode so you can learn the mechanics and pace before wagering real stakes.

items.title: Can I set deposit and time limits?
items.answer: Yes, account tools let you set limits and reminders so you can manage sessions comfortably.

items.title: Why did my bet settle differently than expected?
items.answer: Betting markets follow specific settlement rules and odds capture timing; your bet history shows full settlement details.

items.title: Can I stack multiple bonuses?
items.answer: It depends on the offer; most often one main bonus is active at a time to keep wagering clear and transparent.

items.title: How do I track mission and tournament progress?
items.answer: The promotions section shows tasks, deadlines, your progress, and leaderboards for tournaments.
